sprykerComponent.name: ajax-provider
sprykerComponent.readme: Enables ajax requests to be performed to a specified url with URL parameters and response handling.

tags.name: event
tags.description: fetching An event which is triggered when an ajax request is sent to the server.

tags.name: event
tags.description: fetched An event which is triggered when an ajax request is closed.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Sends an ajax request to the server.

tags.description: The argument type returned by a successful promise.
